adGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group

campaignId.description: The unique identifier of the campaign the ad group belongs to

adProduct.description: The ad product that the ad group belongs to

name.description: The name of the ad group

state.description: The user-set state of the ad group

deliveryStatus.description: This is an overall status if the ad group is delivering or not

deliveryReasons.description: This is a list of reasons why the ad group is not delivering

creativeType.description: The creative type that this ad group contains

creationDateTime.description: The date time that the ad group was created

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The date time that the ad group was last updated

defaultBid.description: The default maximum bid for ads and targets in the ad group

currencyCode.description: The currency code the bid is expressed in

goal.description: The type of goal associated with the ad group

kpi.description: The way the goal associated with the ad group is measured

adId.description: The unique identifier of the ad

adGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group

adProduct.description: The ad product associated to the ad

state.description: The user-set state of the ad

name.description: The user-set name of the ad

creationDateTime.description: The date time that the ad was created

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The date time that the target was last updated

deliveryStatus.description: The overall status indicating whether the ad is delivering or not

deliveryReasons.description: A list of reasons why the ad is not delivering

adVersionId.description: The version associated with the ad

productId.description: The ID associated with the product

products.description: The products or subject to be featured as part of the ad

assetId.description: The asset library ID associated with the brand logo image asset

assetVersion.description: The version of the brand logo asset

top.description: Desired coordinates for the top of the cropped image

left.description: Desired coordinates for the left of the cropped image

width.description: The desired width of the cropped image

height.description: The desired height of the cropped image

assetId.description: The asset library ID associated with the custom image asset

assetVersion.description: The version of the custom image asset

top.description: Desired coordinates for the top of the cropped image

left.description: Desired coordinates for the left of the cropped image

width.description: The desired width of the cropped image

height.description: The desired height of the cropped image

assetId.description: The asset library ID associated with the video asset

assetVersion.description: The version of the video asset

headline.description: The headline or custom text associated with the ad

brandName.description: The brand name displayed in the ad

landingPageType.description: The type of landing page associated with the ad

landingPageUrl.description: The URL of the landing page

headline.description: The headline associated to the card

landingPageType.description: The type of landing page associated to the card

landingPageUrl.description: The URL of the landing page associated to the card

productIdType.description: The type of identifier for the product associated with the card

productId.description: The identifier of the product associated with the card

campaignId.description: The unique numerical ID associated with a campaign

adProduct.description: The ad product associated with the campaign

portfolioId.description: Optional. Shows the portfolio ID associated with a campaign

name.description: The advertiser-specified name of the campaign

startDate.description: The start date of the campaign

endDate.description: The end date of the campaign

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The date time that the campaign was last updated

creationDateTime.description: The date time that the campaign was created

deliveryStatus.description: This is an overall status if the campaign is delivering or not

deliveryReasons.description: This is a list of reasons why the campaign is not delivering

brandEntityId.description: This is the brand entity ID that the campaign is associated with

bidStrategy.description: The auto bidding strategy applied to the campaign

placement.description: The placement associated with bid adjustment settings

percentage.description: The percentage change associated with a given placement

shopperSegment.description: The selection of the shopper segment

percentage.description: The percentage change for the shopper segment

shopperCohortType.description: The type associated with a shopper cohort

percentage.description: The percentage change for the shopper cohort

audienceId.description: The unique numerical ID associated with a audience segment

audienceSegmentType.description: The type associated with an audience segment

recurrenceTimePeriod.description: The recurrence time period for the budget cap

amount.description: The monetary amount of the budget cap

ruleAmount.description: The monetary amount when a budget rule is applied

targetingSettings.description: The type of targeting supported by the campaign

costType.description: The way the campaign bids and is charged

targetId.description: The unique identifier of the target

adGroupId.description: The unique identifier of the ad group that the target belongs to

campaignId.description: The campaignId associated to the target (for campaign-level targets only)

adProduct.description: The ad product that the target belongs to

state.description: The user set state of the target

negative.description: Whether to target (false) or exclude (true) the given target

deliveryStatus.description: This is an overall status if the target is delivering or not

deliveryReasons.description: This is a list of reasons why the target is not delivering

creationDateTime.description: The date time that the target was created

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The date time that the target was last updated

bid.description: The bid applied to the target

currencyCode.description: The currency code of the bid applied to the target

matchType.description: The match type associated with the target

nativeLanguageKeyword.description: The unlocalized keyword text in the preferred locale of the advertiser

nativeLanguageLocale.description: The locale preference of the advertiser

productCategoryResolved.description: The resolved human readable name of the category

productBrand.description: Refinement to target a specific brand within the product category

productBrandResolved.description: The resolved human readable name of the brand

productGenre.description: Refinement to target a specific product genre within the product category

productPriceLessThan.description: Refinement to target products with a price less than the value

productPriceGreaterThan.description: Refinement to target products with a price greater than the value

productRatingLessThan.description: Refinement to target products with a rating less than the value

productRatingGreaterThan.description: Refinement to target products with a rating greater than the value

productAgeRange.description: Refinement to target products for a specific age range

productAgeRangeResolved.description: The resolved product age range to target

productPrimeShippingEligible.description: Refinement to target products that are prime shipping eligible

event.description: The product based event to target the audience

lookback.description: The lookback period in days to target the audience

audienceId.description: An audience identifier retrieved from the audiences/list resource
